name: Json Helper
description:
Easy to use toolwindow that can perform JSON string manipulations directly in your IDE rather than finding websites to do it for you. git This plugin will:

  • Prettify your ugly json
  • Uglify your pretty json
  • Escape your json
  • De-escape your json
  • Support JMES json path search. See here for examples
  • Experimental support for variable declaration parsing. E.g. public final String json = "{\"key\":\"value\"}"; becomes raw prettified json
  • Json inspection to allow expansion of nested json. Also works in json scratch files
notes:
Version 1.1.2

  • Bugfix: Fixed use of a API that was broken in IntelliJ 2020.3

Version 1.1.1

  • Feature: Code inspection added for nested json. Quick fix option to expand
  • Feature: Editor is now same as standard json scratch file. Allows bracket completion, highlight, validation and format code shortcut
  • Feature: Supports collapse/expand of nodes
  • Feature: Prettify on paste
  • Bugfix: Json with an array as root node can now be parsed and escaped

Version 1.0.3

  • Updated intelliJ support version

Version 1.0.2

  • Fixed issue with parsing inner json

Initial release. Support for:

  • Prettify json
  • Uglify json
  • Escape json
  • De-escape json
  • JMES json path search.
  • Variable declaration parsing (experimental)
